job_title: Registered Nurse, BSN in Colorado Springs, CO
pros: Culture, Doctors, people all together great
cons: Wages for permanent vs traveling wages

job_title: Hospital Unit Clerk in Rifle, CO
pros: Great relationship building, culture and service focused

review_title: The only place I've ever worked that actually fells like a family
pros: Leadership is focused on providing the best care to patients and have the resources to do the job.
cons: The patient load leaves you searching for things to do many days.
